trans-unit.source: Supplies a hash code for an object, using a custom hash function.
The <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> interface is used in conjunction with the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> class.

The objects used as keys by a <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> object must override the <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> methods.
<xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the key's implementation of <xref:System.Object.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is used as the hash code provider.
<xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or the key's implementation of <xref:System.Object.Equals%2A?displayProperty=fullName> is used as the comparer.

However, some overloads of the <xref:System.Collections.Hashtable> constructor take a parameter that is an <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> implementation, or a parameter that is an <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation, or both.

If an <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider> implementation is passed to the constructor, the <xref:System.Collections.IHashCodeProvider.GetHashCode%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of that implementation is used as the hash code provider.

If an <xref:System.Collections.IComparer> implementation is passed to the constructor, the <xref:System.Collections.IComparer.Compare%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method of that implementation is used as the comparer.
Returns a hash code for the specified object.
The return value from this method must not be persisted for two reasons.
First, the hash function of a class might be altered to generate a better distribution, rendering any values from the old hash function useless.
Second, the default implementation of this class does not guarantee that the same value will be returned by different instances.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> for which a hash code is to be returned.
A hash code for the specified object.
The type of obj is a reference type and obj is `null`.
